```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

rm(list=ls())

library(httr)
library(XML)
library(jsonlite)
library(RCurl)

```

##Sample 1

```{r html}

html <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tagensingh/sps-data607-week7/main/SPS-DATA-A-7_1.html"
html <- GET(html)
html <- rawToChar(html$content)
html <- htmlParse(html)
html <- readHTMLTable(html)
HTML <- data.frame(html)

html

```

```{r xml}

xml <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tagensingh/sps-data607-week7/main/SPS-DATA-A-7_1.xml"
xml <- GET(xml)
xml <- rawToChar(xml$content)
xml <- xmlParse(xml)
xml <- xmlToList(xml)
xml <- data.frame(xml)

xml

```
